expire.session: The session has expired. Please log in again.
empty.id_pw: Please enter the ID and password.
invalid.login: No user found or the password is incorrect.
sameword.pw: The password cannot contain four consecutive identical characters.
contiword.pw: The password cannot contain four consecutive characters.
containid.pw: The password cannot contain the ID (four or more characters).
type.pw: The password does not meet the requirements. Please enter a combination of uppercase and lowercase letters, special characters, and numbers, 8-20 characters long.
no.info.email:
SMTP information is not provided.
Please contact the administrator to retrieve your password.
invalid.overuptdt: days have passed since you changed your password. Please change your password.
invalid.currentpw: The new password is the same as the current password. Please enter a new password.
invalid.recentpw: The new password is the same as a recent password. Please enter a new password.
success.changepw:
Your password has been changed. 
 For security reasons, please log in again.
access.noown: General users without an affiliated group do not have access rights.
access.generaluser: General users do not have access rights.
deleted.group: The affiliated group has been deleted. Please contact the administrator.
error.check.serverlog: An error has occurred. Please check the server logs.
dupl.cdval: Duplicate code values cannot be used.
dupl.cdgrpval: Duplicate code group values cannot be used.
dupl.time: Registration is not possible due to overlapping time.
dupl.pageParameter: Registration is not possible due to overlapping parameters.
dupl.url: Duplicate URL values cannot be used.
over.count: You can register up to 20 items.
auth.modify.menu: The admin menu cannot be modified.
no.targetdevice: No Device ID is provided for registration.
invalid.logtype: Please enter the correct log type.
dupl.logtype: This log type is already registered.
dupl.packageNm: Duplicate App names cannot be used.
error.data.load: An error occurred while retrieving data. Please try again in a moment.
no.appinfo:
No app information is registered.
You can use the service after registering app information.
report.popup.question: You can drag the selected type to change the order of the contents of the report.
noSettingMailInfo: Mail transfer information is not set.
noSessionData2: Session data is empty, no events were recorded.

otp.expired.issued.time: OTP input time has expired. Please log in again.
otp.exceeded.max.attempts: OTP input attempts exceeded. Please re-register OTP.

too.long.params: The Response Msg exceeds the allowed length and cannot be added to favorites.
